data.title: Tickets and Fares
data.meta_description: Find the latest ticket fare information and know before you go on your next bus ride with the Pinellas Suncoast Transit Authority (PSTA).
data.text:
Fares can be paid with:

Flamingo Fares card or app

Tap-enabled credit or debit card (excluding American Express)

Digital wallet (Apple Pay, Google Pay) on your smartphone or smartwatch

Cash: Have exact change ready (dollar bills or coins, pennies not accepted). A fare is required for each bus you board. Cash is NOT accepted onboard the SunRunner, but is accepted on all other PSTA routes.

Valid for:

Students who attend PCS, USF, SPC, and PTC

Youth age 9-18

Senior 65+

Disabled (with proper ID)

ID Required: Adult Student ID, PSTA Senior/Disabled Photo ID, HART Senior/Disabled Photo ID, PCPT Senior/Disabled Photo ID, Government-issued Photo ID (showing age as of 65 years or older), or Medicare Card. To obtain a PSTA Senior/Disabled Photo ID, present proof of age 65 years or older and/or complete an application at a PSTA Customer Service Center.

Reduced Fares are available when paying with:

Flamingo Fares: present your ID at any PSTA Customer Service Center to have your reduced fare added to your account. The validator will automatically charge your discounted fare each time you board.

Cash: Have your ID and exact change ready at boarding (dollar bills or coins, pennies not accepted). A fare is required for each bus you board. Cash is NOT accepted onboard the SunRunner, but is accepted on all other PSTA routes.

At this time reduced fares are not available with contactless payments (credit card, debit card, smartphone, smartwatch)

By using the Flamingo Fares card or app, riders will always take advantage of the lowest possible fare, as well as unique benefits such as fare capping. With this benefit, Flamingo Fares keeps track of your fare usageâ€”you will never pay more than the daily maximum in a single service day, or the monthly maximum in a calendar month.
